modules.description: This module manages a mutable reference to a time value, including optional timezone offset and periodic update intervals. It provides direct access to the current time reference, timezone offset, and update period through mutable fields. Use this module to track and update a shared time value with configurable resolution and timezone context in real-time applications.

This module provides direct access to the system's POSIX clock to retrieve the current time in UTC, measure clock precision, and obtain time zone offset information. It operates on `Ptime.t` for absolute time values and `Ptime.span` for durations, with low-level access to picosecond-resolution time data via integer pairs. Concrete use cases include timestamping events with high precision, calculating time differences, and adjusting for local time zone offsets in logging or scheduling applications.
